LanguageData.Extractgasn.label:
Extract N-16 gas Extract N-16 gas. Extraction of seven units of the gas requires one unit of steel for drilling. Extraction speed is highly dependent on the mining skill. Extracting N-16 gas
Synthesize Eftam Synthesize eftam by exposing steel and stone blocks to N-16 gas. Produces 50 eftam. Synthesizing eftam
Make chemfuel Synthesize chemfuel by exposing eftam to N-16 gas. Produces 30 chemfuel. Synthesizing chemfuel
Synthesize traimat Synthesize traimat by exposing a steel slag chunk, a component, and simerium to N-16 gas. Traimat is best used in training pawns. Produces 250 traimat. Synthesizing traimat
Synthesize myrithium x30 Synthesize myrithium by exposing tisnite and eftam to N-16 gas. Produces 30 myrithium. Synthesizing myrithium
Synthesize vilanite x30 Synthesize vilanite by exposing simerium and phasarium to N-16 gas. Produces 30 vilanite. Synthesizing vilanite
Synthesize element X-32 Synthesize vilanite by exposing simerium and phasarium to N-16 gas. Produces 30 element X-32. Synthesizing element X-32
Synthesize mechanites Synthesize mechanites by exposing components and silver to N-16 gas. Synthesizing mechanites
Make Mecha device Make mini device that controls the movement of mechanites. Requed for super advanced items and buildings. Making Mecha device
Make AI persona core Make AI persona core Making AI persona core
Synthesize luciferium х5 Synthesize luciferium by exposing mehanites, devilstrand and penoxycyline. Synthesizing luciferium
